csl_hrpwm.h File Reference
IP » HRPWM

This file contains declarations of CSL APIs corresponding to the HRPWM module. This also contains necessary structure, enum and macro definitions and APIs are consolidated to provide more functional APIs. More...

Functions

int32_t CSL_epwmHrLoadCmpAHrValue2 (uint32_t pwmBaseAddr, uint32_t hrBaseAddr, uint32_t compAHighResVal, uint32_t ShadowToActiveLoadTrigger)
 This API loads Counter-Comparator A high resolution value and also configure the pulse select bits, that select which pulse to use for timing events in the HRPWM module. More...
 

Detailed Description

This file contains declarations of CSL APIs corresponding to the HRPWM module. This also contains necessary structure, enum and macro definitions and APIs are consolidated to provide more functional APIs.

Please refer to programming sequence of EPWM
